trans-unit.source: Exposes <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource" /> types to UI Automation.
trans-unit.target: 向 UI 自动化公开 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource" /> 类型。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer> is used as a peer for <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource> when it contains the following tree:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer> 作为对等方使用<xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource>时，它包含以下树：

trans-unit.source: ![HwndSource->Visual->2 UIElement objects](~/add/media/apgenericroot.png "HwndSource->Visual->2 UIElement objects")
trans-unit.target: ![HwndSource->Visual->2 个 UIElement 对象](~/add/media/apgenericroot.png "HwndSource-> Visual-> 2 个 UIElement 对象")

trans-unit.source: Because only <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> types have peers, and visuals are not <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> types, a common parent does not exist in the UI automation tree for the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> types.
trans-unit.target: 因为仅<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>类型具有同级，并且视觉对象不是<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>类型的 UI 自动化树中不存在公共父级<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>类型。

trans-unit.source: UI automation expects a single root peer from the application; therefore, the .NET Framework creates a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer> for the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource> in order to serve as a single root peer to parent peers for the two <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> types.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化要求在从该应用程序; 单个根对等方因此，.NET Framework 创建<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer>为<xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource>为了发挥为用于对这两个对等的父节点的单个根对等方<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>类型。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the root peer is a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowAutomationPeer>.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，根对等是<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowAutomationPeer>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 与此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取与此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer" /> 的控件类型。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.
trans-unit.target: 此方法由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" /> 调用。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.Pane" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.Pane" /> 枚举值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> that represents the bounding rectangle of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" />，它表示与此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer" /> 相关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 的绑定矩形。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle" />.
trans-unit.target: 此方法由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle" /> 调用。

trans-unit.source: The bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 绑定矩形。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取与此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer" /> 的名称。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.
trans-unit.target: 此方法由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" /> 调用。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains "Pane".
trans-unit.target: 包含“Pane”的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets the text label of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取与此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 的文本标签。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName" />.
trans-unit.target: 此方法由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName" /> 调用。

trans-unit.source: The string that contains the label.
trans-unit.target: 包含标签的字符串。

trans-unit.source: You can think of the name property as if it were a string of text that users use to explain the control they are referring to.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将名称属性，就好像用户用来解释它们所引用控件的文本字符串。

trans-unit.source: Make certain that you have a textual representation for all controls in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/includes/tlasharptla-gui-md.md)] so that you can programmatically refer to the control in a localized manner.
trans-unit.target: 请确保你有中的所有控件的文本表示形式[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/includes/tlasharptla-gui-md.md)]以便你可以以编程方式引用到控件本地化的方式。
